function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Competing policy frames leading to conflicting approaches to climate and public health crises.","Impact":"Failure to effectively address climate policy and public health emergencies.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness to promote a unified approach, policy coordination, and cooperation between Member States.","Technologies":"Communication and collaboration tools, data analytics for policy evaluation, and decision support systems.","People":"Member States, policymakers, and government officials.","Owner":"European Union, international organizations, and government agencies."}]}
